title: Service â€” Sections (Flexible)

fields.label: Service Sections
fields.name: service_sections
fields.instructions: Build the service page sections in the required order.

sub_fields.label: Eyebrow Text
sub_fields.name: eyebrow
sub_fields.instructions: Small text above the title (e.g., 'Professional Service').

sub_fields.label: Custom Title
sub_fields.name: title
sub_fields.instructions: Override the default page title. Leave empty to use the page title.

sub_fields.label: Show Title
sub_fields.name: show_title
sub_fields.instructions: Show or hide the title in hero section.

sub_fields.label: Hero Image
sub_fields.name: hero_image
sub_fields.instructions: Image used in service cards or hero area. Falls back to featured image if not set.

sub_fields.label: Overlay Opacity
sub_fields.name: overlay_opacity
sub_fields.instructions: Adjust the darkness of the overlay (0 = transparent, 100 = fully dark).

sub_fields.label: Content Alignment
sub_fields.name: content_align
sub_fields.instructions: Choose the alignment of hero content.

sub_fields.label: Booking Link
sub_fields.name: booking_link
sub_fields.instructions: Custom URL for booking button. Default: /book-online/

sub_fields.label: Custom Phone Number
sub_fields.name: phone_number
sub_fields.instructions: Override the default phone number. Leave empty to use the default.

sub_fields.label: Minimum Height
sub_fields.name: min_height
sub_fields.instructions: Set the minimum height of the hero section.

sub_fields.label: Custom CSS Class
sub_fields.name: custom_class
sub_fields.instructions: Add custom CSS classes for additional styling.

sub_fields.label: Subtitle
sub_fields.name: subtitle
sub_fields.instructions: Optional subtitle for the advantages block.

sub_fields.label: Problems
sub_fields.name: problems
sub_fields.instructions: List common problems and short descriptions.

sub_fields.label: Image
sub_fields.name: image
sub_fields.instructions: Optional image for this problem (used in alternating layout).

sub_fields.label: Catalog Title
sub_fields.name: catalog_title
sub_fields.instructions: Section title for the services catalog.

sub_fields.label: Category Items
sub_fields.name: category_items
sub_fields.instructions: Add service items to this category.

sub_fields.label: Item Link
sub_fields.name: item_link
sub_fields.instructions: Link to service page or category.

sub_fields.label: Title
sub_fields.name: title
sub_fields.instructions: Section title for the catalog description.

sub_fields.label: Description
sub_fields.name: description
sub_fields.instructions: Main description text for the catalog section.

sub_fields.label: Background Image
sub_fields.name: background_image
sub_fields.instructions: Single background image for the section.

sub_fields.label: List Items
sub_fields.name: items
sub_fields.instructions: Add list items with icons and text.

sub_fields.label: Icon
sub_fields.name: item_icon
sub_fields.instructions: Upload icon image or leave empty for default SVG.

sub_fields.label: Button Text
sub_fields.name: button_text
sub_fields.instructions: If empty, will use link title.

sub_fields.label: Image
sub_fields.name: image
sub_fields.instructions: Main image displayed in the section.

sub_fields.label: Background Image
sub_fields.name: bg
sub_fields.instructions: Optional background image for the section.

description: Flexible content structure for service sections.
